import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { CogIcon, BellIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, UserIcon, WifiIcon, SunIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const Settings = () => { const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ aiMode: true, motionDetection: true, naturalLightIntegration: true, notifications: true, autoDim: true, energySaving: true }); const [energyRate, setEnergyRate] = useState(0.12); const [currency, setCurrency] = useState('USD'); const handleSettingChange = (setting, value) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [setting]: value })); toast.success(`${setting.replace(/([A-Z])/g, ' $1').toLowerCase()} ${value ? 'enabled' : 'disabled'}`); }; return (
